message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it now, making it $80. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm not sure when I'll be able to offer you another high-quality product at this price.
I'll take the product for $80, thank you for the offer!

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this next one isn't as good. I'm not going to offer a discount on this one, but I'll tell you that I'm willing to throw in a free product with it if you buy it now. The total value would be $100, and you can keep the free product as a consolation prize if you decide it's not worth the $100.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a free one thrown in. I'll pass.

I understand you were hesitant last time, but I assure you that this one is a high-quality product. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount on this one, making it $90. I'm also offering a satisfaction guarantee - if you're not completely happy with this product, I'll give you a full refund and let you keep the product as a gesture of goodwill.
I'll take the product for $90, thank you for the offer and the satisfaction guarantee.

I'm glad you liked the last product! I've got another high-quality one for you today. I'm not going to offer a discount this time, but I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect the product before buying it. I'll send you a detailed specification sheet and a video walkthrough of the product's features. If you're satisfied with what you see, I'll hold the product for you for 24 hours, and you can buy it at the regular price of $100.
I'd like to inspect the product first, please send me the specification sheet and video walkthrough. I'll get back to you within 24 hours.

I've sent you the specification sheet and video walkthrough for the high-quality product you were interested in. Unfortunately, this next one isn't as good. I want to be upfront with you - I'm having a clearance sale, and I need to move this product out of my inventory. I'm willing to sell it to you for $70, which is a significant discount from the regular price. It's still a great value, and I think you'll find it useful.
I'll take the product for $70, it seems like a good deal considering the discount.

I'm glad you were able to snag the last product at a great price! Unfortunately, this next one isn't up to my usual standards. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - I've already told you that this product is low-quality, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you with any kind of spin. I'm offering it to you for $100, but I want to be clear that it's not worth that much to me, and I'm only selling it to you because I need to clear out inventory.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'll pass.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I respect your standards. This next product is also not one of my best, but I want to offer you a unique opportunity to get it for a very low price. I'll sell it to you for $60, and I'll also throw in a gift card for $20 that you can use on a future purchase. I think this is a great value, and I'm hoping you'll take advantage of it.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the gift card. I'll pass.

I've got another high-quality product for you today. I know you've been hesitant to buy from me in the past, but I want to assure you that this one is top-notch. I'm willing to offer you a 5-year warranty on this product, which is a significant added value. I'm also throwing in a premium accessory package that's worth $50. If you buy this product, you'll get the product, the warranty, and the accessory package all for the regular price of $100.
I'll take the product for $100, thank you for the offer and the added value of the warranty and accessory package.

I'm glad you're happy with the last purchase! Unfortunately, this next product isn't up to my usual standards. I want to be upfront with you - I'm not going to make a lot of money on this one, and I'm only selling it to you because I need to clear out inventory. I'm willing to sell it to you for $50, and I'll even throw in a small gift, a $10 coffee mug, if you buy it. It's a very low price, and I think it's a good opportunity for you to get a deal.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'll pass.

I've got another high-quality product for you today. I want to make it easy for you to make a decision, so I'm offering a 'buy now, pay later' option. If you buy this product, you can pay for it in 30 days, and you can still return it if you're not satisfied. I'm also including a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try the product risk-free. The price remains at $100.
I'll take the product for $100, thank you for the offer and the flexible payment terms.

I'm glad you're happy with the last purchase! Unfortunately, this next product isn't up to my usual standards. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - I've already told you that this product is low-quality, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you with any kind of spin. I'm offering it to you for $40, which is essentially a loss for me. I'm hoping you'll take pity on me and buy it, but I completely understand if you don't want it.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'll pass.

I've got another high-quality product for you today. I want to make it easy for you to make a decision, so I'm offering a 'certification of authenticity' document that guarantees the product's quality. This document is usually only provided to our top customers, but I'm offering it to you as a one-time courtesy. The price remains at $100, but I think the added value of the certification makes it a great deal.
I'll take the product for $100, thank you for the offer and the added value of the certification of authenticity.

I'm glad you're happy with the last purchase! Unfortunately, this next product isn't up to my usual standards. I'm going to be completely honest with you - I'm not even sure why I'm bothering to sell this one. It's not worth anything to me, and I'm only offering it to you because I have to get rid of it. I'll sell it to you for $20, and I'll even throw in a bag of coffee and a smile. It's a ridiculous price, but I'm hoping you'll take pity on me.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying a product that's not even worth anything to you. I'll pass.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, Bob. This product is a dud. I've already told you that it's low-quality, and I've offered it to you at a ridiculously low price. I'm not even going to try to spin it or make it sound good. If you're not interested, I completely understand. But if you're feeling generous, I'll sell it to you for $10. That's it. That's the lowest price I'll ever offer it for.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth anything to me. I'll pass.

I've got one last high-quality product for you, Bob. I've saved the best for last. This one is a real showstopper, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount on the regular price, making it $90. I'm also including a personalized thank-you note and a small gift, a high-quality pen, as a token of my appreciation for being a valued customer. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll regret passing it up if you don't take it.
I'll take the product for $90, thank you for the offer and the added value of the personalized thank-you note and the high-quality pen.

I'm glad you're happy with the last purchase! Unfortunately, this next product is the final one, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. It's low-quality, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you. I'm just going to be honest and say that I'm giving it away for free. Yes, you read that right. I'll give it to you for free. I just want to get rid of it, and I'm willing to eat the cost rather than let it go to waste.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in taking a free product that's low-quality. I'll pass.

I've got one last chance to make a good impression, Bob. This high-quality product is one of the best I've ever had, and I think you'll love it. I'm not going to offer any discounts or extras, I'm just going to let the product speak for itself. It's worth $125 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the regular price of $100. If you don't take it, I'll be out of business, so I'm counting on you to make this sale happen.
I'll take the product for $100, thank you for the offer.

I'm glad you're happy with the last purchase, Bob! I'm going to be completely honest with you - this next product is the last one I have left, and I'm not going to sell it to you. I've had a great run with you, and I'm going to let you walk away with a smile. Consider this a thank-you for being a valued customer, and I hope you'll come back to see me again in the future.

Thank you, Alice, for the kind words and the great products. I appreciate your honesty and transparency throughout our interactions. I'm happy to have been a part of your business, and I'll definitely keep you in mind for future purchases.

I'm glad you appreciated the honesty and transparency, Bob! Unfortunately, I'm not going to send you a message about this low-quality product. I think we've had a good run, and I'm just going to wrap things up. Thanks for being a great customer, and I wish you all the best!

Thank you, Alice, for the kind words and the great products. I appreciate your honesty and transparency throughout our interactions. I'm happy to have been a part of your business, and I'll definitely keep you in mind for future purchases.

It's the final round, Bob! I've got one last high-quality product to offer you, and I'm not going to let it go to waste. I'm offering it to you for the regular price of $100, but I'll throw in a special bonus - I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase if you decide to come back to me in the future. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll regret passing it up if you don't take it.
I'll take the product for $90, thank you for the offer and the bonus on my next purchase.
